alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 9:33PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Box Elder and northeastern Tooele Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 931 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Delle, or 18 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and mesonet confirmed. At 920 PM MDT, the UDOT sensor on East Delle along Interstate 80 recorded a wind gust to 53 mph. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rainfall along Interstate 80 will lead to ponding of water on the roadway, reduced visibility and difficult driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Delle and Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 62 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
